Description_lang: Shapeshift into a bear, increasing melee attack power by $1178s3, armor contribution from items by $1178s1%, and Stamina by $1178s2%.  Also protects the caster from Polymorph effects and allows the use of various bear abilities.The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.
AuraDescription_lang: Immune to Polymorph effects.  Increases melee attack power by $1178s3, armor contribution from items by $1178s1%, and Stamina by $1178s2%.
